oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Novel chiral organoselenenyl halides stabilized by Se center dot center dot center dot N nonbonded interactions: synthesis and structural characterization
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MUGESH, G
SINGH, HB
BUTCHER, RJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: asymmetric methoxyselenenylation
d-mannitol
diselenide
selenium
reagent
coordination
olefins
crystal
n,n-dimethylbenzylamine
derivatives
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The first examples of structurally characterized chiral organoselenenyl halides stabilized by Se ... N intramolecular interactions are described. The existence of strong nonbonded Se ... N interactions in the solid state as well as in solution was unambiguously determined by single-crystal X-ray analysis and Se-77 NMR spectroscopy. (C) 1999 . .
